climbs.name: Best Summer Ever!
climbs.fa: Juan Esteban Usubillaga, 2nd Evan Marsh (thanks to Juan Beta)

content.description: The V6 is a stand start on the lowest part of the arete. The rock is so good, and you can even trust the small stuff (not to give away any beta). There is a super sweet V10-ish start that still needs to be done. It starts on a downward sloping rail, climbing under the boulder to connect with the V6 variation.
content.protection:
2 or more pads are suggested (and some trustworthy friends, all). This protects similar to

Autobot

in lower Chaos.
content.location: The boulder is on the west side of Tunnel Rd. (US Hwy 66) a few hundred yards shy of the Dunraven Inn. Find the boulder suspended between the cliff and a smaller boulder.
